name: Whackd (WHACKD)
description: $WHACKD is a deflationary Ethereum token created by John McAfee to raise awareness of corruption within the highest levels of US society. A meme coin rumored to contain secrets of the world's corrupt officials and public figures, just waiting to be permanently added onto the blockchain. The token has some unique mechanics; 10% of every transaction is burnt and every 1000th transaction is burned completely.
